ing.item: (4-serving size) instant vanilla pudding (ingredients for pudding)
(8 oz.) pineapple tidbits in juice; drained

directions.step:
Notes: By Patricia A. Miller, Lehighton. The Times News, PA
Make pudding according to package directions in bowl. Stir in lemon zest,
lemon juice and coconut extract. Reserve 1/4 cup pudding for topping. Spoon remaining pudding equally into dessert bowls. Combine remaining ingredients in bowl. Spoon on top of pudding. Top with reserved pudding. Makes 4 servings.
